org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery
Interface IAeRecoveryEngine

All Superinterfaces:
IAeBusinessProcessEngine, IAeBusinessProcessEngineInternal, IAeBusinessProcessFactory
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeRecoveryEngine
public interface IAeRecoveryEngine
extends IAeBusinessProcessEngineInternal

Extends IAeBusinessProcessEngineInternal to define the interface for a business process engine that can recover the state of a process from a list of IAeJournalEntry instances.

          Recovers the state of the specified process from the given list of IAeJournalEntry instances and returns a list of IAeRecoveredItem instances representing recovered requests.

Method Detail

recover

public java.util.List recover(IAeBusinessProcess aProcess,
                              java.util.List aJournalEntries,
                              boolean aQueueRecoveredItems)
                       throws AeBusinessProcessException
Recovers the state of the specified process from the given list of IAeJournalEntry instances and returns a list of IAeRecoveredItem instances representing recovered requests. Queues the recovered items if aQueueRecoveredItems is true.

Parameters:
aProcess -
aJournalEntries -
aQueueRecoveredItems -
Returns:
A list of IAeRecoveredItem instances.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
